name: skillsmatchergame
description: A Game to match desired skills with a candidate

scripts.build-dev: cp -r src lib &&   karma start && concat-cli -f lib/ImgSprite.js lib/StaticModel.js lib/BackgroundItemFactory.js lib/colider.js lib/HitBox.js lib/AutomatedDropModel.js lib/SkillFactory.js lib/SkillSprite.js lib/Boundry.js lib/KeyboardInputSource.js lib/PlayerFactory.js lib/CharacterSprite.js  lib/KeyboardListenerModel.js lib/Character.js lib/Game.js lib/Main.js -o script.js
